title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Digital Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in using foundational digital tools
context.additional_context: A step-by-step digital competency development program for current elementary school practitioners based on smartphone technology.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize digital communication tools (chat, video conferencing, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can perform the process of planning-creating-sharing digital content through project-based learning
Learners can respond to digital ethics issues (copyright, personal information, etc.) that may occur in educational settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
